gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19115-2 Geographic Information - Metadata - Part 2: Extensions for Imagery and Gridded Data

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: DSCOVR Magnetometer Level 2 One Second Averages

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Interplanetary magnetic field observations collected from magnetometer on DSCOVR satellite - 1-second average of Level 1 data

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: To monitor solar wind near the L1 point. These data support forecasts and research of phenomena that have the potential to disrupt and damage Earth-based infrastructure.

gmd:descriptor.gco:CharacterString: One or more measurements were extracted from a packet whose timestamp was older than the threshold at the point of processing
One or more measurements were extracted from a packet whose timestamp was in the future at the point of processing
Possible magnetometer saturation based on a measurement range smaller than the next packet's range or by the mag being in manual range mode.
Fill
Instrument in calibration mode
AOCS non-science mode (spacecraft maneuver/safehold)
Average sample count below threshold
Overall sample quality (0 = normal, 1 = suspect, 2 = error)

gmd:maintenanceNote.gco:CharacterString: This metadata record was transformed 2016-11-29 with model-to-stds.xsl.

gmi:description.gco:CharacterString: Provides vector magnetic field measurements on three axes.
Deep Space Climate Observatory is a NOAA Earth observation and space weather satellite stationed at the first Lagrange point (L1).
